thread.title: Patricia
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text: I received a surprise birthday cake from Bake Me a Wish. It was beautiful and absolutely delicious. Unfortunately, my daughter could not enjoy it with me, so I purchased a cake for her for Valentine's day. It arrived on time and she, too, loved it. The Best cake ever. Totally recommend your products for any occasion.
